name: WiseCovers
overview:
WiseCovers produces customized cases for your Kindle 3rd generation using book cloth and a scuba vinyl interior to hold it in place.

WiseCovers is a Dallas based company that has brought back the look and feel of a real book into the hands of Kindle readers. Our cases are all hand made and manufactured here in the USA. Furthermore, 10% of all of our profits are being donated to schools in need through Donor’s Choose. What makes our cases most unique is the ability to have your name or phrase custom foil stamped on the outer cover.
